tidbits.title: Ancient History
tidbits.description: Armenia boasts a rich historical legacy, being one of the world's oldest civilizations, with a heritage dating back thousands of years, including ancient monasteries and archaeological sites.

tidbits.title: Cultural Resilience
tidbits.description: Despite a turbulent past, Armenia preserves a strong cultural identity, evident in its traditional music, dance, intricate craftsmanship like carpet weaving, and cuisine.

tidbits.title: Mount Ararat
tidbits.description: Though located outside its borders, Mount Ararat holds immense cultural significance to Armenians, featuring prominently in their folklore, art, and national identity.
